tasks.task_description: 该任务展示了如何使用Streamlit的滑块组件来选择一个值，并计算该值的平方。
tasks.example_code:
import streamlit as st
x = st.slider("Select a value")
st.write(x, "squared is", x * x)
tasks.expected_input: 任意数字（通过滑块选择）
tasks.expected_output: x的平方值，例如："3 squared is 9"

code_blocks:
import streamlit as st
x = st.slider("Select a value")
st.write(x, "squared is", x * x)
